replies.msg:
Drawing POSITIVE attention, impression, and support from the rest of HK, other countries and international crowd are critical.

The closer to 9/1,9/2,9/3...., the more edited videos like this (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Kbiyn4_U5C4) may be posted continously to maximize negative impressions on protest in HK people and especially international audience, who may not know the true picture but only judge by images in edited videos.

Not sure what kind of work can be done to minimize the negative impact of all these media.

It'll be great if there are experts in media communications, strategic marketing, and propaganda . Battle on media can be very intense in the coming days !
